eduversum.name: KSimus
eduversum.description: KSimus is a logical circuits simulator (we could also say digital circuits). It has no built-in elements but it has a plug-ins interface with which you can load dynamic libraries which implement the digital elements. Two libraries are provided by the author. [b]Boolean[/b] implements a RS-Flipflop, AND, OR, XOR and their negation, a pulse generator and an input/output. [b]Data Recorder[/b] is used for recording signals.
